name: dart_ipfs
desc: Production-ready IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) implementation in Dart.

name: CID
desc: A Content Identifier (CID) for content-addressed data in IPFS.

name: CID.new
desc: Creates a CID with the specified components.

name: CID.v0
desc:
Creates a CIDv0.
CIDv0 is always: SHA2-256, DAG-PB, Base58BTC.

name: CID.v1
desc: Creates a CIDv1.

name: codec
desc: The content codec (e.g., 'dag-pb', 'raw', 'dag-cbor').

name: computeForData
desc: Computes CID for data (async version for compatibility).

name: computeForDataSync
desc: Computes CID for data (sync version).

name: decode
desc: Decodes a CID from its string representation.

name: encode
desc: Encodes the CID to its string representation.

name: fromBytes
desc: Parses a CID from its raw binary representation.

name: fromContent
desc: Creates a CID from raw content.

name: fromProto
desc: Creates a CID from a Protobuf representation.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: multibaseType
desc: The multibase encoding type for string representation.

name: multihash
desc: The multihash containing the hash algorithm and digest.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toBytes
desc: Converts the CID to its binary representation.

name: toProto
desc: Converts the CID to a Protobuf representation.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: validate
desc: Validates the CID.

name: version
desc: The CID version (0 or 1).

name: DHTConfig
desc: Configuration options for the DHT (Distributed Hash Table)

name: DHTConfig.fromJson
desc: Creates a DHTConfig from JSON

name: DHTConfig.new
desc: Creates a new DHTConfig with default Kademlia settings.

name: alpha
desc: Number of parallel lookups (alpha value in Kademlia)

name: bucketSize
desc: Size of k-buckets

name: enableProviderRecording
desc: Whether to enable provider recording

name: enableValueStorage
desc: Whether to enable value storage

name: maxProvidersPerKey
desc: Maximum number of providers to store per key

name: maxRecordsPerQuery
desc: Maximum number of records to return per query

name: protocolId
desc: Protocol identifier for DHT

name: requestTimeout
desc: Time to wait before considering a request as failed

name: toJson
desc: Converts the config to JSON

name: GatewayMode
desc: The central node orchestrating all IPFS operations.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: IPFS
desc: Main entry point for the IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) implementation.

name: addDirectory
desc: Adds a directory to IPFS.

name: addFile
desc: Adds a file to the IPFS network from its raw data.

name: create
desc: Creates a new IPFS node.

name: exportCAR
desc: Exports a CAR file for the given CID.

name: findProviders
desc: Finds providers for a CID.

name: get
desc: Gets the content of a file or directory from IPFS.

name: importCAR
desc: Imports a CAR file.

name: ls
desc: Lists the contents of a directory in IPFS.

name: onNewContent
desc: Stream of new content CIDs added to the node.

name: peerID
desc: Gets the peer ID of the IPFS node.

name: pin
desc: Pins a CID to prevent it from being garbage collected.

name: publish
desc: Publishes a message to a PubSub topic.

name: publishIPNS
desc: Publishes an IPNS record.

name: requestBlock
desc: Requests a block from the network using Bitswap.

name: resolveDNSLink
desc: Resolves a DNSLink to its corresponding CID.

name: resolveIPNS
desc: Resolves an IPNS name to its corresponding CID.

name: start
desc: Starts the IPFS node.

name: stats
desc: Gets the node's statistics.

name: stop
desc: Stops the IPFS node.

name: subscribe
desc: Subscribes to a PubSub topic.

name: unpin
desc: Unpins a CID.

name: IPFSConfig
desc: Configuration for an IPFS node.

name: IPFSConfig.fromJson
desc: Creates configuration from JSON

name: IPFSConfig.new
desc: Creates a new IPFSConfig with the specified options.

name: IPFSConfig.withDefaults
desc: Creates a new IPFSConfig with a generated nodeId

name: blockStorePath
desc: Path to the blockstore.

name: customConfig
desc: Key-value pair for custom configuration options.

name: dataPath
desc: The base path for node data.

name: datastorePath
desc: Path to the datastore.

name: debug
desc: Enable debug mode.

name: defaultBandwidthQuota
desc: Default bandwidth quota in bytes.

name: dht
desc: Distributed Hash Table configuration.

name: enableCircuitRelay
desc: Enable Circuit Relay support.

name: enableContentRouting
desc: Enable content routing.

name: enableDHT
desc: Enable DHT protocols.

name: enableDNSLinkResolution
desc: Enable DNSLink resolution.

name: enableGraphsync
desc: Enable Graphsync protocol.

name: enableIPLD
desc: Enable IPLD support.

name: enableLibp2pBridge
desc: Whether to enable the libp2p bridge transport.

name: enableLogging
desc: Enable system-wide logging.

name: enableMetrics
desc: Enable metrics collection.

name: enablePubSub
desc: Enable PubSub protocols.

name: enableQuotaManagement
desc: Enable bandwidth quota management.

name: fromFile
desc: Loads configuration from a YAML file

name: garbageCollectionEnabled
desc: Enable automatic garbage collection.

name: garbageCollectionInterval
desc: Interval for garbage collection.

name: keystore
desc: The keystore for managing keys.

name: keystorePath
desc: Path to the keystore.

name: libp2pIdentitySeed
desc: Optional seed for persistent libp2p identity.

name: libp2pListenAddress
desc: The listen address for the libp2p bridge.

name: logLevel
desc: The logging level (e.g., 'info', 'debug', 'error').

name: metrics
desc: Metrics collection configuration.

name: network
desc: Detailed network configuration.

name: nodeId
desc: The unique node identifier.

name: offline
desc: Run node in offline mode.

name: security
desc: Security and identity configuration.

name: storage
desc: Storage and datastore configuration.

name: toJson
desc: Converts to JSON representation.

name: verboseLogging
desc: Enable verbose logging.

name: IPFSNode
desc: The main IPFS node implementation.

name: IPFSNode.fromContainer
desc: Creates an IPFSNode from a pre-configured service container.

name: addDirectory
desc: Adds a directory to IPFS and returns its CID.

name: addFile
desc: Adds a file to IPFS and returns its CID.

name: addFileStream
desc: Adds file content from a stream (memory-efficient for large files)

name: addresses
desc: Get the addresses this node is listening on

name: bandwidthMetrics
desc: Broadcast stream of bandwidth metrics

name: bitswap
desc: Access to the Bitswap handler.

name: blockStore
desc: Get the block store

name: cat
desc: Get content by CID (alias for get method)

name: connectToPeer
desc: Connect to a peer by multiaddr

name: connectedPeers
desc: Get list of connected peers

name: container
desc: Returns the service container for dependency injection.

name: create
desc: Factory method to create and build an IPFS node from configuration.

name: datastore
desc: Access to the underlying datastore.

name: dhtClient
desc: Get the DHT client

name: dhtHandler
desc: Access to the DHT handler.

name: disconnectFromPeer
desc: Disconnect from a peer

name: exportCAR
desc: Exports a CAR file for the given CID.

name: findProviders
desc: Finds providers for a given CID.

name: get
desc: Gets the content of a file or directory from IPFS.

name: getHealthStatus
desc: Returns a health status map for all subsystems.

name: importCAR
desc: Imports a CAR (Content Addressable Archive) file.

name: ls
desc: Lists the contents of an IPFS directory.

name: onNewContent
desc: Stream of new content CIDs added to this node.

name: peerID
desc: This node's peer ID.

name: peerId
desc: Get the peer ID of this node

name: pin
desc: Pins a CID to prevent it from being garbage collected.

name: pinnedCids
desc: Get list of pinned CIDs

name: publicKey
desc: Get the public key of this node (base64 encoded)

name: publish
desc: Publish a message

name: publishIPNS
desc: Publishes an IPNS record for the given CID.

name: pubsubMessages
desc: Stream of incoming PubSub messages

name: requestBlock
desc: Requests a specific block from a peer via Bitswap.

name: resolveDNSLink
desc: Resolves a DNSLink to its corresponding CID.

name: resolveIPNS
desc: Resolve IPNS name to CID

name: resolvePeerId
desc: Resolve a peer ID to its known addresses (from Routing Table)

name: router
desc: Access to the network router.

name: setGatewayMode
desc: Sets the mode for retrieving content.

name: start
desc: Starts the IPFS node and all its subsystems.

name: stop
desc: Stops the IPFS node gracefully, releasing all resources.

name: subscribe
desc: Subscribe to a topic

name: unpin
desc: Unpins a CID from IPFS.

name: unsubscribe
desc: Unsubscribe from a topic

name: MetricsConfig
desc: Configuration options for telemetry and metrics collection.

name: MetricsConfig.fromJson
desc: Creates a MetricsConfig from a JSON map.

name: MetricsConfig.new
desc:
Creates a metrics configuration with the given options.
Creates a new MetricsConfig with the given collection options.

name: collectNetworkMetrics
desc: Whether to collect network bandwidth and peer metrics.

name: collectStorageMetrics
desc: Whether to collect disk and block storage metrics.

name: collectSystemMetrics
desc: Whether to collect CPU and memory metrics.

name: collectionIntervalSeconds
desc: How often metrics are collected, in seconds.

name: enablePrometheusExport
desc: Whether to expose metrics via Prometheus endpoint.

name: enabled
desc: Whether metrics collection is enabled.

name: prometheusEndpoint
desc: The HTTP path for Prometheus metrics.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this configuration to a JSON map.

name: NetworkConfig
desc: Network configuration for the IPFS node.

name: NetworkConfig.fromJson
desc: Creates a network configuration from a JSON map.

name: NetworkConfig.new
desc: Creates a network configuration with the given options.

name: NetworkConfig.withGeneratedId
desc: Creates a network configuration with the given options and a generated Peer ID.

name: bootstrapPeers
desc: Peers to connect to on startup.

name: connectionTimeout
desc: Timeout for connection attempts.

name: defaultBootstrapPeers
desc: Default IPFS bootstrap peers.

name: defaultListenAddresses
desc: Default multiaddr listen addresses for TCP.

name: delegatedRoutingEndpoint
desc: Optional HTTP endpoint for delegated routing.

name: enableMDNS
desc: Whether to enable mDNS for local peer discovery. Defaults to true.

name: enableNatTraversal
desc: Whether to enable NAT traversal (UPnP/NAT-PMP). Defaults to false for security.

name: listenAddresses
desc: Addresses to listen on for incoming connections.

name: maxConnections
desc: Maximum number of concurrent connections.

name: nodeId
desc: Unique identifier for this node.

name: toJson
desc: Converts the network configuration to a JSON map.

name: ProtocolConfig
desc: Configuration for a specific protocol.

name: ProtocolConfig.new
desc: Creates a new ProtocolConfig.

name: maxRetries
desc: Maximum number of retries per message.

name: messageTimeout
desc: Timeout for individual messages.

name: protocolId
desc: The protocol identifier.

name: PubSubMessage
desc: Represents a message published on a PubSub topic.

name: PubSubMessage.new
desc: Creates a PubSub message.

name: content
desc: The message content.

name: sender
desc: The sender's peer ID.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: topic
desc: The topic this message was published to.

name: SecurityConfig
desc: Security-related configuration options for IPFS node

name: SecurityConfig.fromJson
desc: Creates a SecurityConfig from a JSON map.

name: SecurityConfig.new
desc: Creates a new SecurityConfig with default encryption and rotation settings.

name: dhtDifficulty
desc: SEC-005: Static PoW difficulty for DHT Sybil protection (number of zero bits)

name: enableKeyRotation
desc: Whether to enable key rotation

name: enableRateLimiting
desc: Whether to enable request rate limiting

name: enableTLS
desc: Whether to enable TLS for secure communication

name: keyRotationInterval
desc: Key rotation interval

name: maxAuthAttempts
desc: Maximum number of authentication attempts

name: maxRequestsPerMinute
desc: Maximum requests per minute

name: tlsCertificatePath
desc: The path to the TLS certificate file

name: tlsPrivateKeyPath
desc: The path to the TLS private key file

name: toJson
desc: Converts this configuration to a JSON map.

name: StorageConfig
desc: Configuration options for IPFS storage.

name: StorageConfig.fromJson
desc: Creates a StorageConfig from a JSON map.

name: StorageConfig.new
desc: Creates a new StorageConfig with default paths and limits.

name: baseDir
desc: Base directory for all IPFS data

name: blockPath
desc: Computed path to the block storage directory.

name: blocksDir
desc: Directory for block storage

name: datastoreDir
desc: Directory for datastore

name: datastorePath
desc: Computed path to the datastore directory.

name: enableGC
desc: Whether to enable garbage collection

name: gcInterval
desc: Garbage collection interval

name: keysDir
desc: Directory for keys

name: keysPath
desc: Computed path to the keys directory.

name: maxBlockSize
desc: Maximum size for a single block

name: maxStorageSize
desc: Maximum storage size in bytes

name: toJson
desc: Converts this configuration to a JSON map.
